stems_affixes.value_cn: 民主的,民主主义的;民主政体的
stems_affixes.word_buile: demo人民+crat统治+ic……的→人民统治的→民主主义的
demo人民+graph写,图+ic的→用图表的方式写人民→统计人民的→人口统计的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 民主;民主政治,民主政体;民主主义
stems_affixes.word_buile: demo人民+cracy统治→人民统治→人民做主
demo人民+crat统治→[主张]人民统治[的人]→democrat
demo人民+crat统治+ism主义→人民统治的主义→民主主义
demo人民+graph写,图+y表名词,加在形容词或r结尾的单词后→人口统计学
demo人民+crat统治+ize……化→v.民主化;使民主化

Sentence.sentence: Demographers (人口统计学者) reckon that three-quarters of humanity could be city-dwelling by 2050, with most of the increase coming in the fast-growing towns of Asia and Africa.

Ronald Lee, director of the Centre on the Economics and Demography of Ageing at the University of California, Berkeley, puts it briefly and clearly: "We don't really know what population ageing will be like, because nobody has done it yet.
